# destination()

**Instance Method**

Gets the destination for the link when the destination was specified as a PDFDestination object.

## Declaration

```swift
func destination() -> PDFDestination!
```

## Working with link destinations

- **setDestination(_:)**: Sets the destination for the link as a PDFDestination object.
- **url()**: Gets the destination for the link when the destination was specified as a URL.
- **setURL(_:)**: Sets the destination for the link as a URL.
